views.view_definition:
WITH RECURSIVE user_mode AS (
         SELECT u.user_id,
            gm.code AS mode_code,
                CASE gm.code
                    WHEN 'LOW'::text THEN 1.0
                    WHEN 'CHILL'::text THEN 2.0
                    WHEN 'FLOW'::text THEN 2.5
                    WHEN 'EVOLVE'::text THEN 3.0
                    ELSE 2.0
                END AS mode_mult
           FROM (users u
             LEFT JOIN cat_game_mode gm ON ((gm.game_mode_id = u.game_mode_id)))
        ), half_life AS (
         SELECT um.user_id,
            p.code AS pillar_code,
            (
                CASE um.mode_code
                    WHEN 'LOW'::text THEN
                    CASE p.code
                        WHEN 'BODY'::text THEN 7
                        WHEN 'MIND'::text THEN 9
                        WHEN 'SOUL'::text THEN 11
                        ELSE NULL::integer
                    END
                    WHEN 'CHILL'::text THEN
                    CASE p.code
                        WHEN 'BODY'::text THEN 6
                        WHEN 'MIND'::text THEN 8
                        WHEN 'SOUL'::text THEN 10
                        ELSE NULL::integer
                    END
                    WHEN 'FLOW'::text THEN
                    CASE p.code
                        WHEN 'BODY'::text THEN 5
                        WHEN 'MIND'::text THEN 7
                        WHEN 'SOUL'::text THEN 9
                        ELSE NULL::integer
                    END
                    WHEN 'EVOLVE'::text THEN
                    CASE p.code
                        WHEN 'BODY'::text THEN 4
                        WHEN 'MIND'::text THEN 6
                        WHEN 'SOUL'::text THEN 8
                        ELSE NULL::integer
                    END
                    ELSE
                    CASE p.code
                        WHEN 'BODY'::text THEN 6
                        WHEN 'MIND'::text THEN 8
                        WHEN 'SOUL'::text THEN 10
                        ELSE NULL::integer
                    END
                END)::numeric AS h_days
           FROM (user_mode um
             CROSS JOIN cat_pillar p)
          WHERE (p.code = ANY (ARRAY['BODY'::text, 'MIND'::text, 'SOUL'::text]))
        ), xp_base AS (
         SELECT t.user_id,
            p.code AS pillar_code,
            COALESCE((sum(t.xp_base))::numeric, (0)::numeric) AS xp_base
           FROM (tasks t
             JOIN cat_pillar p ON ((p.pillar_id = t.pillar_id)))
          WHERE ((t.active = true) AND (p.code = ANY (ARRAY['BODY'::text, 'MIND'::text, 'SOUL'::text])))
          GROUP BY t.user_id, p.code
        ), xp_base_fixed AS (
         SELECT xb.user_id,
            xb.pillar_code,
                CASE
                    WHEN (sum(xb.xp_base) OVER (PARTITION BY xb.user_id) = (0)::numeric) THEN (60)::numeric
                    ELSE xb.xp_base
                END AS xp_base
           FROM xp_base xb
        ), targets AS (
         SELECT um.user_id,
            xbf.pillar_code,
            (xbf.xp_base * um.mode_mult) AS xp_week_target,
            ((xbf.xp_base * um.mode_mult) / 7.0) AS xp_day_target
           FROM (xp_base_fixed xbf
             JOIN user_mode um ON ((um.user_id = xbf.user_id)))
        ), leak_and_k AS (
         SELECT hl.user_id,
            hl.pillar_code,
                CASE
                    WHEN (hl.h_days > (0)::numeric) THEN ((1)::numeric - power(0.5, (1.0 / hl.h_days)))
                    ELSE (0)::numeric
                END AS d,
                CASE
                    WHEN (tg.xp_day_target > (0)::numeric) THEN ((100.0 * ((1)::numeric - power(0.5, (1.0 / hl.h_days)))) / tg.xp_day_target)
                    ELSE (0)::numeric
                END AS k
           FROM (half_life hl
             JOIN targets tg ON (((tg.user_id = hl.user_id) AND (tg.pillar_code = hl.pillar_code))))
        ), last7 AS (
         SELECT (CURRENT_DATE - gs.gs) AS day
           FROM generate_series(6, 0, '-1'::integer) gs(gs)
        ), grid AS (
         SELECT u.user_id,
            l7.day,
            p.code AS pillar_code
           FROM ((users u
             CROSS JOIN last7 l7)
             CROSS JOIN cat_pillar p)
          WHERE (p.code = ANY (ARRAY['BODY'::text, 'MIND'::text, 'SOUL'::text]))
        ), logs_xp AS (
         SELECT dl.user_id,
            dl.date AS day,
            p.code AS pillar_code,
            (COALESCE(sum((dl.quantity * t.xp_base)), (0)::bigint))::numeric AS xp
           FROM ((daily_log dl
             JOIN tasks t ON ((t.task_id = dl.task_id)))
             JOIN cat_pillar p ON ((p.pillar_id = t.pillar_id)))
          WHERE (p.code = ANY (ARRAY['BODY'::text, 'MIND'::text, 'SOUL'::text]))
          GROUP BY dl.user_id, dl.date, p.code
        ), xp_by_day AS (
         SELECT g.user_id,
            g.day,
            g.pillar_code,
            COALESCE(lx.xp, (0)::numeric) AS xp
           FROM (grid g
             LEFT JOIN logs_xp lx ON (((lx.user_id = g.user_id) AND (lx.day = g.day) AND (lx.pillar_code = g.pillar_code))))
        ), grace_window AS (
         SELECT u.user_id,
            COALESCE(u.first_date_log, min(dl.date)) AS first_log_date,
            ((COALESCE(u.first_date_log, min(dl.date)) + '6 days'::interval))::date AS grace_until
           FROM (users u
             LEFT JOIN daily_log dl ON ((dl.user_id = u.user_id)))
          GROUP BY u.user_id, u.first_date_log
        ), seq AS (
         SELECT x.user_id,
            x.pillar_code,
            x.day,
            x.xp,
            row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY x.user_id, x.pillar_code ORDER BY x.day) AS rn,
            count(*) OVER (PARTITION BY x.user_id, x.pillar_code) AS rn_max
           FROM xp_by_day x
        ), energy AS (
         SELECT s.user_id,
            s.pillar_code,
            s.day,
            s.rn,
            s.rn_max,
                CASE
                    WHEN (s.day <= COALESCE(gw.grace_until, '-infinity'::date)) THEN 100.0
                    ELSE 60.0
                END AS e_prev
           FROM (seq s
             LEFT JOIN grace_window gw ON ((gw.user_id = s.user_id)))
          WHERE (s.rn = 1)
        UNION ALL
         SELECT s.user_id,
            s.pillar_code,
            s.day,
            s.rn,
            s.rn_max,
                CASE
                    WHEN (s.day <= COALESCE(gw.grace_until, '-infinity'::date)) THEN 100.0
                    ELSE GREATEST(0.0, LEAST(100.0, (((1.0 - lk.d) * e.e_prev) + (lk.k * COALESCE(s.xp, (0)::numeric)))))
                END AS e_prev
           FROM (((energy e
             JOIN seq s ON (((s.user_id = e.user_id) AND (s.pillar_code = e.pillar_code) AND (s.rn = (e.rn + 1)))))
             LEFT JOIN grace_window gw ON ((gw.user_id = s.user_id)))
             LEFT JOIN leak_and_k lk ON (((lk.user_id = s.user_id) AND (lk.pillar_code = s.pillar_code))))
        ), today_energy AS (
         SELECT energy.user_id,
            energy.pillar_code,
            energy.e_prev AS energy_0_100,
            (energy.e_prev / 100.0) AS energy_0_1
           FROM energy
          WHERE (energy.rn = energy.rn_max)
        )
 SELECT user_id,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (pillar_code = 'BODY'::text) THEN energy_0_100
            ELSE NULL::numeric
        END) AS hp_pct,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (pillar_code = 'SOUL'::text) THEN energy_0_100
            ELSE NULL::numeric
        END) AS mood_pct,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (pillar_code = 'MIND'::text) THEN energy_0_100
            ELSE NULL::numeric
        END) AS focus_pct,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (pillar_code = 'BODY'::text) THEN energy_0_1
            ELSE NULL::numeric
        END) AS hp_norm,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (pillar_code = 'SOUL'::text) THEN energy_0_1
            ELSE NULL::numeric
        END) AS mood_norm,
    max(
        CASE
            WHEN (pillar_code = 'MIND'::text) THEN energy_0_1
            ELSE NULL::numeric
        END) AS focus_norm
   FROM today_energy te
  GROUP BY user_id;

SELECT dl.date,
    dl.user_id,
    sum((dl.quantity * t.xp_base)) AS xp_day
   FROM (daily_log dl
     JOIN tasks t ON ((t.task_id = dl.task_id)))
  GROUP BY dl.date, dl.user_id;

WITH base AS (
         SELECT u.user_id,
            (COALESCE(sum(
                CASE
                    WHEN t.active THEN t.xp_base
                    ELSE NULL::smallint
                END), (0)::bigint))::numeric AS xp_base_sum
           FROM (users u
             LEFT JOIN tasks t ON ((t.user_id = u.user_id)))
          GROUP BY u.user_id
        )
 SELECT b.user_id,
    gs.level,
    (round(
        CASE
            WHEN (gs.level = 0) THEN ((b.xp_base_sum * 0.4) * (7)::numeric)
            ELSE (b.xp_base_sum * power((gs.level)::numeric, 1.3))
        END))::bigint AS xp_required
   FROM (base b
     JOIN generate_series(0, 50) gs(level) ON ((b.xp_base_sum > (0)::numeric)))
  ORDER BY b.user_id, gs.level;

WITH week_logs AS (
         SELECT daily_log.log_id,
            daily_log.date,
            daily_log.user_id,
            daily_log.task_id,
            daily_log.quantity,
            daily_log.created_at
           FROM daily_log
          WHERE (daily_log.date >= ((CURRENT_DATE - '6 days'::interval))::date)
        )
 SELECT wl.user_id,
    cp.code AS pillar_code,
    sum((cd.xp_base * GREATEST(wl.quantity, 1))) AS xp_week
   FROM (((week_logs wl
     JOIN tasks t ON ((t.task_id = wl.task_id)))
     JOIN cat_difficulty cd ON ((cd.difficulty_id = t.difficulty_id)))
     JOIN cat_pillar cp ON ((cp.pillar_id = t.pillar_id)))
  GROUP BY wl.user_id, cp.code;

WITH active AS (
         SELECT tasks.user_id,
            count(*) AS total
           FROM tasks
          WHERE (tasks.active = true)
          GROUP BY tasks.user_id
        ), done_today AS (
         SELECT dl.user_id,
            count(DISTINCT dl.task_id) AS completed
           FROM daily_log dl
          WHERE (dl.date = CURRENT_DATE)
          GROUP BY dl.user_id
        )
 SELECT COALESCE(a.user_id, d.user_id) AS user_id,
    COALESCE(a.total, (0)::bigint) AS total,
    COALESCE(d.completed, (0)::bigint) AS completed
   FROM (active a
     FULL JOIN done_today d ON ((d.user_id = a.user_id)));

SELECT u.user_id,
    (COALESCE(v.total_xp, (0)::numeric) + COALESCE(b.bonus_total, (0)::numeric)) AS total_xp
   FROM ((users u
     LEFT JOIN ( SELECT v_user_daily_xp.user_id,
            sum(v_user_daily_xp.xp_day) AS total_xp
           FROM v_user_daily_xp
          GROUP BY v_user_daily_xp.user_id) v ON ((v.user_id = u.user_id)))
     LEFT JOIN ( SELECT xp_bonus.user_id,
            (sum(xp_bonus.amount))::numeric AS bonus_total
           FROM xp_bonus
          GROUP BY xp_bonus.user_id) b ON ((b.user_id = u.user_id)));

SELECT dl.user_id,
    cp.code AS pillar_code,
    sum((cd.xp_base * GREATEST(dl.quantity, 1))) AS xp
   FROM (((daily_log dl
     JOIN tasks t ON ((t.task_id = dl.task_id)))
     JOIN cat_difficulty cd ON ((cd.difficulty_id = t.difficulty_id)))
     JOIN cat_pillar cp ON ((cp.pillar_id = t.pillar_id)))
  GROUP BY dl.user_id, cp.code;

WITH base AS (
         SELECT v_user_xp_by_pillar.user_id,
            v_user_xp_by_pillar.pillar_code,
            v_user_xp_by_pillar.xp
           FROM v_user_xp_by_pillar
        ), bonus AS (
         SELECT xb.user_id,
            cp.code AS pillar_code,
            sum(xb.amount) AS xp
           FROM (xp_bonus xb
             JOIN cat_pillar cp ON ((cp.pillar_id = xb.pillar_id)))
          GROUP BY xb.user_id, cp.code
        )
 SELECT COALESCE(b.user_id, bn.user_id) AS user_id,
    COALESCE(b.pillar_code, bn.pillar_code) AS pillar_code,
    (COALESCE(b.xp, (0)::bigint) + COALESCE(bn.xp, (0)::bigint)) AS xp
   FROM (base b
     FULL JOIN bonus bn ON (((bn.user_id = b.user_id) AND (bn.pillar_code = b.pillar_code))));

SELECT dl.user_id,
    dl.date,
    sum((cd.xp_base * GREATEST(dl.quantity, 1))) AS xp_today
   FROM ((daily_log dl
     JOIN tasks t ON ((t.task_id = dl.task_id)))
     JOIN cat_difficulty cd ON ((cd.difficulty_id = t.difficulty_id)))
  WHERE (dl.date = CURRENT_DATE)
  GROUP BY dl.user_id, dl.date;

SELECT user_id,
    clerk_user_id,
    email,
    first_name,
    last_name,
    TRIM(BOTH ' '::text FROM concat_ws(' '::text, first_name, last_name)) AS full_name,
    image_url,
    timezone,
    channel_scheduler,
    first_programmed,
    first_tasks_confirmed,
    created_at,
    updated_at
   FROM users;

indexes.index_definition: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cat_difficulty_code_key ON public.cat_difficulty USING btree (code)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cat_difficulty_pkey ON public.cat_difficulty USING btree (difficulty_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cat_emotion_code_key ON public.cat_emotion USING btree (code)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cat_emotion_pkey ON public.cat_emotion USING btree (emotion_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cat_game_mode_code_key ON public.cat_game_mode USING btree (code)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cat_game_mode_pkey ON public.cat_game_mode USING btree (game_mode_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cat_pillar_code_key ON public.cat_pillar USING btree (code)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cat_pillar_pkey ON public.cat_pillar USING btree (pillar_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX cat_trait_pkey ON public.cat_trait USING btree (trait_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ux_cat_trait_pillar_code ON public.cat_trait USING btree (pillar_id, code)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX clerk_webhook_events_pkey ON public.clerk_webhook_events USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX clerk_webhook_events_svix_id_key ON public.clerk_webhook_events USING btree (svix_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX daily_log_pkey ON public.daily_log USING btree (log_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX daily_log_user_task_date_key ON public.daily_log USING btree (user_id, task_id, date)
CREATE INDEX ix_daily_log_user_date ON public.daily_log USING btree (user_id, date)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX emotions_logs_pkey ON public.emotions_logs USING btree (emotion_log_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX emotions_logs_user_date_key ON public.emotions_logs USING btree (user_id, date)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX onboarding_answers_pkey ON public.onboarding_answers USING btree (onboarding_answers_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX onboarding_foundations_pkey ON public.onboarding_foundations USING btree (onboarding_foundations_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ux_onb_foundations_session_pillar ON public.onboarding_foundations USING btree (onboarding_session_id, pillar_id)
CREATE INDEX ix_onb_session_user ON public.onboarding_session USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX onboarding_session_pkey ON public.onboarding_session USING btree (onboarding_session_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ux_onboarding_session ON public.onboarding_session USING btree (user_id, client_id)
CREATE INDEX ix_tasks_user_group_active ON public.tasks USING btree (user_id, tasks_group_id, active)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX tasks_pkey ON public.tasks USING btree (task_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_clerk_user_id ON public.users USING btree (clerk_user_id)
CREATE INDEX ix_users_clerk ON public.users USING btree (clerk_user_id)
CREATE INDEX ix_users_email ON public.users USING btree (email_primary)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_clerk_user_id_key ON public.users USING btree (clerk_user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_clerk_user_id_uq ON public.users USING btree (clerk_user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_email_primary_key ON public.users USING btree (email_primary)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_pkey ON public.users USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_tasks_group_id_uq ON public.users USING btree (tasks_group_id)
CREATE INDEX ix_xp_bonus_user ON public.xp_bonus USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX ux_xp_bonus_user_source_pillar ON public.xp_bonus USING btree (user_id, source, pillar_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX xp_bonus_pkey ON public.xp_bonus USING btree (xp_bonus_id)

http_request.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_7) DemoBrowser/1.0

onboarding_foundations.open_text: Focus on gentle routines to regain confidence.

tasks.task: Take a five-minute breathing break after breakfast.
Design a weekend activity that combines body and mind pillars.
